casebody.data:
HIGHLAND PARK BOARD OF EDUCATION, Appellant-Petitioner,
v.
David C. HESPE, Commissioner of Education of the State of New Jersey, New Jersey State Board of Education and Hatikvah International Academy Charter School, Respondents-Respondents. East Brunswick Board of Education, Intervenor. C-936 September Term 2017
080734 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 15, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003890-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
